content.detailedDescription:
I was traviling back from visiting family and i saw what i thought to be a helicopter's spot light; covering basicly a whole mountain side. the closer i got to the light, the brighter and whiter it seemed to be. once i got my car into an area where i could see the mountain side better, i pulled over onto a wide-spot along side a curve; i was curious, as the light seemed to be coming from nowhere and i did not hear the roar of a helicopter. i turned off my engine so i could hear better and kept waiting to see what or where the light was originating from; no luck. i decided then to restart my car and head on down the road but as i reached for the key the light started coming closer my way. 
i lost around two hours of time that night, no idea what happened either. i had no physical trauma after this, but low frequency sounds now send me into an anxiety attack (for no reason) and also give me pain all over my body. 
not much of a story to tell, but i am almost 100% positive i had some kind of encounter that night with something not of this world.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: The light from no where...

content.detailedDescription:
What happened left me troubled up to now. i was coming from africa vi a london where we took american airlines and we were heading to miami. our port of entrance.
i was travelling with my wife, my daughter (4 years old) and my son (20 months old). we were sitting in the right side of the plane. i don't remember well but i think it happened in the sky above massashussets according to the on-board map navigation that has that plane to each passenger seat. just when i wake up from a long  sleep, i check the young kid if he is ok because he was sleeping in the hand of his mother, then later on i look outside trough the window and, for a while i admire the clouds. then i saw a kind point coming very fast. first i tought it was a bird or a plane, but speed with which it was coming left me wonder. suddenly i saw it stop to a distance of about half a km, but the clouds were at its right side and the left side was clear. i remained admiringit for a while. it was that kind of ufo that we have seen in documentary then i tried to wake up my wife because she was sleeping. when she wake up i tried to show it to her but it was not there anymore. i tried to explain to her what i've seen, but she could not understand what is really an ufo (ovni in french).
it did not impressed me to much because i was thinking that it was american made aircraft copying ufo. but what happened later on is what made me wonder all the time what i've seen in the sky of massachussets:

i cannot remember the date but i think it one week or ten days after my arrival in las vegas, one congolese had shown to me an african market where i could get some food imported from africa. the market was situated on west charleston, and i was in the rtnc bus sitting with a certain man. he was tall and not fat. he asked me if i was which part in africa and when i've arrived in las vegas. i explained to him. he was talking to me in english while my mind was somewhere else. so, he was a kind of talkative and, to discourage him talking to me, i was answering whatever he said with a hmmm! all the time then speak to me surprisingly asking me if i saw it then i realize that he notice that i was not paying attention to what he was telling me. i asked him what does he want, then he asked if i didn't see an ufo when i was un the plane. i ask him what is an ufo, he explained to me it is. then he asked me again if i've seen it. i told him no. then i started thinking why he was talking to me wearing sun glasses, then he did like he read my mind. he took off he sun glasses and look at me and repeat the same question asking if i've seen the ufo. i said no but with the feeling of fear because he was black and his eyes were like pure white and ovale without the black color that we usually have (really very strange). he told me that he doesn't understand that i didn't se it and many people report seeing it in the sky. i fell unconfortable to sit with him but by chance the bus reached my stage of exit (charleston & mayland pkwy). 

back home i explained to my wife what happened, but i'm still wondering how he knew that i've seen it because i didn't tell anybody about it.
what i've seen in the sky was for me just a kind of american super power man made aircraft. if it so, please, let me know.

contact me any time you want but please, i want to be anonymous
content.summary: It was like a disc with a kind of head at its middle, above it

content.detailedDescription:
If you want to see hundreds of ufos flying in a pattern in addition to many more flying into and out of the pattern i can instruct you how to do exactly that. you will need a video camera with a rather long lens (i use a canon g2) as these craft are not visible to the unaided eye due to speed, distance and you will be looking directly toward the sun. i have nearly five hours of video tape (dv) and about 3,000 digital stills (sony 828) shot in a number of locations at different times over the last two years in oregon and california. these craft can be photographed any time the sun is shining. did you get that? this is not a one time event��� i get the same results every time i set up my camera, every time. i have a theory that we can hail these craft. are you ready for contact? there is one craft that is most prevalent but by no means the only type seen. one appears to be manufactured on earth most likely by a secret program of the us military. it looks like a conventional fighter jet except for whatever powers it makes a bright light originating from the wing tips that crosses the middle of the fuselage making it look much like a dragonfly. it is extremely fast perhaps 10 to 20 miles per second.

the photos are:

file 1: digital still
file 2 and 3: single frames from video

this represents snow flakes on the tip of the iceberg.
content.summary: Multiple craft of differing shapes

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving north on rose in yorba linda. when i noticed a meteor like object in the sky. i thought it was a meteor. another appeared soon after i noticed the first. i then thought it might be a satellite entering earth orbit. they both seemed to burn out the reignite at different intervals. they both left a fire trail as a meteor would. they also changed direction. they appeared to be going in circle for a little bit. my girlfriend says that one object appeared triangular. we watched them for about 3 minutes. they then burned out or just went beyond our field of view.
content.summary: Meteor like to me. triangular to my girlfriend

content.detailedDescription: Stationary light that slowly rotated and appeared to change shape.  appeared to be a 'j' shape.  directly under it there was another light that moved faster.  both had tails.
content.summary: Two lights.  one slow-moving and the other very active.  both had tails.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my wife, and my mom were heading to the city of placentia to a local mervyn's to shop when my wife shouted "oh my god! look up there!" as i looked up in the sky i saw two star looking objects falling downwards like shooting stars. at first that's what i thought they were until they changed their direction of travel and moved right and left. what i seen that day i cannot explain and i am interested to see if anyone else saw the same thing i saw. what i saw that day i swear was unexplainable. my mom never believed in ufo's until that day she told me. the objects continued to zoom back and forth up there also gradually going down until they lowered behind a hill and we werent able to see them anymore. i recorded video of one of the objects on my camera phone. its all i had to take video footage of the object. i need to know if anyone else saw these objects on this day. the surprising thing was there was a plane flying next to it.
content.summary: Two shooting star-like objects hovering in the air going different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back patio sweeping rain water puddles off my walkway when i noticed a brilliant bright white light coming towards my home from the northeast. i saw the object for about 5 seconds before it was nearly going over my home but it was slightly to the north of me. this thing went by at an unearthly speed, did not change directions and was completely silent. i watched the object streak away from me heading southwest. i estimate the object traveled horizon to horizon in 10-15 seconds.
the atmosphere was very clear at the time of my sighting but there were a few scattered low clouds. the object seemed to be flying just above the low clouds and was flying parallel to the ground.  it was extremely hard to make out the shape due to the brightness and speed but it appeared to be a classic saucer shaped ufo. there was an amazing bright white glow around the object as it passed by and it was stunningly beautiful. i did have a camera phone in my pocket but obviously had no time to attempt a picture.
it���s been about two hours since my ufo sighting and my heart is still racing with excitement. what was most shocking to me was how low this ufo was flying for such a remarkable speed and that it was silent! there must be others who witnessed what i saw.
content.summary: Very bright brilliant white object flying low altitude at absurdly stunning speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom was driving, and my dad sitting in the back seat, i was sitting in the front passengers seat, and we were going north on the 57 freeway towards brea, and the traffic started to slow down significantly. i looked ahead, and then a big light (close to the apparent size of the moon) appeared high up in the sky. it looked as though it had a trail of sparks behind it, and it was very slow in its descent.

then, it went out, but another one appeared, just like the first. it seemed to veer off to the right, in a twirling motion. it went out again, and there was a pause, for about 3-5 seconds during which i couldn't see any. then two more appeared, and a third, and they continued to do the same things. one went out, and another two appeared. at this time there were about four or five in the sky at once, all doing the exact same things, except at progressively lower heights. as they got lower, the impression that they were trailing sparks became much more distinct.

towards the end of (what i saw of) the event, there was one which seemed to be very close to the ground - not so close as i would think it a few feet from the ground, but close enough that i grew the genuine concern that it might hit our car, or hit the freeway close enough to cause a crash that would cause damage to us as a result.

however, this, too, disappeared from sight, as though it had burnt out and lost its light.

at first, i thought it was pieces of a satellite, as the trails of sparks that gave them their fiery looks seemed to suggest, and it's far too slow to be a meteor, at least any meteor i've seen. i would think that such a case would involve the objects falling faster, though, so i do have some questions surrounding this idea.

i felt pretty neutral beforehand, and was pretty shaken up during it, mostly relieved afterward that it hadn't caused us harm, whatever it was. i still don't know, don't think this is an extraterrestrial-controlled thing, but it is certainly very unusual (first thing i've seen like it, compared to any ufos, stars, planets, meteors, satellites that i have seen), and i wouldn't rule this possibility out, particularly as i lack a better explanation as of this point.
content.summary: A bunch of fiery objects appearing, twirling, falling, and going out again.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a white blimp up in the sky just standing still with no noise.  it wasn't hovering over my house, it was hovering over the other side of the railroad tracks about 300 ft. in the air.  i can't explain anymore it was in broad daylight on a sunny day, and i was too busy taking my dog for his daily walk.  but i tried to focus on it as much as i could.  when i got back to my house, it was already gone.

i noticed it, because i frequently look up into the sky to see the beautiful red sky.  i just noticed something not moving and it's odd shape.  it was not a plane or helicopter. i've never seen anything like it before in my life.

i couldn't take any photos of it because i lost my camera for sometime, and plus i was walking my dog.
content.summary: It was a white blimp object just standing still as i was taking my dog for his daily walk.

content.detailedDescription:
While a small child (am estimating the year as 1979, but it could have been a couple of years after that), i was playing in my backyard in morristown, new jersey, with my next door neighbor.  it was mid or late afternoon, and i believe it was some time in fall.  we both noticed two objects flying in formation, either fairly far off in the distance or rather small, not too far above the horizon.  they appeared to be flying at precisely the same altitude, with one flying perhaps ten craft-lengths behind the other.  they were entirely silent.  i remember very distinctly that they appeared to glow an odd amber/gold/orange color that was very unlike any color i have ever seen emanate from an airplane's lights.  we watched the two objects as they flew silently and very smoothly, a bit faster than the average plane but not  remarkably fast.  they disappeared behind a treeline and we lost sight of them.


i imagine that they could have been two airplanes reflecting light from the  sun, but somehow that did not seem right at the time, for two reasons.  first, the crafts did not gleam or glint; rather, it appeared that the light was emanating from the crafts themselves, and both were evenly and identically the same color.  second, the shape of the crafts was wrong for an average plane - they seemed a bit too fat in the middle, more an oval than a tube.   the best way to describe their appearance and size from my perspective was that they looked like two flying tic-tac breath mints that glowed gold.
content.summary: While playing with friend in backyard during day, saw two gold oval-shaped craft flying silently

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to the hat in brea (off imperial hwy. and state college)to pick up some food for my family. i seen these lights in the sky and at first i thought it was maybe a couple of meteoroid rocks falling in the sky until they started actually going back and forth. i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, then i seen one of the lights disappear and then the other, within a few seconds they both reappeared. i had called my boyfriend at 5:50p.M.And told him what i seeing, he didn't believe it. i really thought i was seeing things and when i pulled into the hat parking lot i seen all these other cars parked and staring into the sky. the objects seem to keep falling down and i had noticed what seemed to be a plane circling around them and then they just pretty much disappeared behind the trees. i really don't know what it was but it kind of freaked me out. i watched the news all night and didn't see any reports about it.
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with a friend from the easter edge of boulder back towards the foothills, we were at a spot a little ways out on a mesa where you could see up over them. it was fall 2001, approximately 4:00pm, the sun was low in the sky, less than an hour from droping behind the mountains. i was driving due west when i noticed something in the sky hovering over the foothills through some tree branches. at first i did not pay it any attention, but as i continued to drive i noticed it was extremely out of place just as my friend in the car noticed it as well. it was so akward and strange that i pulled my truck over and we climbed on top with a pair of binocular i always carried with me (not a camera unfortunately). the object was of an elongated teardrop shape, with the tapered end (spike) pointing into the sky, this protrusion was slightly curved to the right from our angle, as well it had two smaller, inwardly curved spikes proturding from the top of the main section of the objet, directly on either side of the larger spike. it was dirt brown, and i could see the sun reflecting off the bottom, so it was obviously a solid object. given the distance and how large it still looked, i would say it was between 40 to 100 feet tall, but that is a very rough estimate, it was fairly large though. the other witness and i took turns looking at it through my binoculars for about four minutes, it looked smooth to me, i could not discern and feature on its surface. it hovered motionless for this time then began to move slowly north and west for a short distace, at this time my friend and i gave eachother a very startled look, but when we glaced back, it was gone, i really wish i had not looked away. this was not some fleeting glance of a strage light in the night, we saw a solid, very oddly shaped craft of some sort hovering motionless in broad daylight through binoculars. i don't know what to say, it did not look man made to me, and it was big.
content.summary: Brown, spiked teardrop in daylight over foothills

content.detailedDescription: Pictures from previous post.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Photos for previous post ufo over area

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed the visitations around november when i was actually filming and investigating chemtrail patterns over northern san antonio. i began noticing a strong light in the evening hours which i dismissed for venus. somedays it was visible in the same area of sky and the next it was not. i am a religious person and would pray outside a prayer that i do not know where i learned it from or why i started doing it with my other regular prayers, but since then these visitations had become more frequent, until i stopped praying this prayer recently. i do not claim that this prayer is bringing them around, just the oddness of it happening when it was said. 
the lights would change color just like when you look at a satellite at night and i again thought maybe this was the case until it started moving in patterns not typical of helicopters,planes or balloons. at about the size of a peanut from arms length it is nuetral for about one minute, then it descends to about the size of a watermelon at arms length. it then makes what i can only call "shots" across the sky in various directions for about another minute, then the color patterns begin again of amber,green,blue and red rotating in different areas of a circle pattern. 
i managed to on my last day of doing this prayer to capture it coming down very low almost like it was scanning or wanted a closer look at me and am submitting it here for anyone to look at. it is not common aircraft nor weather balloon, i have seen plenty of those to be able to know the difference. the other thing is there is no sound unless it comes down close like the one in these pictures, then it has a bumblebee sound but very airy to it. i had been having trouble sleeping when all this started staying awake till 3 or 4 in the morning as if someone was in my house. but since stopping that prayer it has quieted down extremely. i will not repeat the prayer nor wish these feelings on anyone else so i am not including it here. i do not expect anyone to believe me nor do i care, i just had to get this off my chest once and for all.
content.summary: Ufo visits periodically over area in evening

content.detailedDescription: 9-5-05 i had an appointment to see a realestate agent at 10:30am in the morning i met the agent and looked at a patio home. in leaving i was talking to the realestate agent in the parking lot when i saw over her shoulder a metallic sliver the sun was reflecting off of it,this object was not moving,the sky was a caribean blue that day no clouds.Ilooked back over at the realestate agent not to be rude and when i looked back this time the object was tilted a metallic disk with a bump in the middle of it at this point fear came over me i don't know why i looked at it for a few seconds and then looked back at the realestate agent and then looked back it was gone.The time seeing this object from beginning to end was about 20 to 25 seconds in the direction of i-65.What it was i don't know.
content.summary: I saw a metallic disk over the shoulder of a realestate agent in the distance in mount washington,ky on 9-5-05

content.detailedDescription: I left my bands practice to pick up a friend around the block. i picked him up and we were on our way back when we noticed a very bright object in the sky to our left. i believe it was in the southwest direction, and it was directly over a sand pit which is about 2 miles by 2 miles in diameter. at first we thought it may have been a planet, but we quikly ruled that out considering that it was only about 1500 feet up and bigger than a 2 story home. the sand pit is directly across the street from our practice so we ended up almost directly under the object which is when we ruled out the idea of a plane. the object was a bright white light in the middle and had red and blue lights swirling around it and was hovering in the same place the whole time. we did not take our eyes off it for a second. then we arrived at our destination and pulled in the driveway not looking anymore, got out and looked up and it was gone. we even went into the pit across the street and it was nowhere in sight. i find it strange that something that big and that bright could have been floating in the sky and dissapeared in a matter of 2-3 seconds. definately wierd, but an exciting rush! it still freaks me out when i think about it...
content.summary: Unknown object: first you see it, then you dont!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping when a loud object like a helicopter flew real low over my house. then it did it again and again. i thought there were several objects, but i got up to look out the window and saw just one circling over and over. i went outside to get a better look.At first i thought it was a helicopter but it didn't have any searchlights turned on (no lights streaming down). it had lights only on the bottom. there were 3 red ones in a row front to back, but in an irregular pattern (not a straight line) and a white one and a green or blue one. pretty sure it was green. so a total of 5 lights on its underbelly. its noise was loud like a plane or  copter. it was flying very low and in quite a small radius, just circling the same part of my neighborhood.It did this for a long time, possibly as long as 30 minutes.
i called the police station to ask if they had had any calls and they said they had had a lot of them. the dispatcher said "we're looking for somebody but we don't see anything." i assumed it was a copter looking for a fugitive, but when i called the police today to see if they caught anyone, she claimed she didn't know anything about it and said "we don't have a press release" which i thought was odd.When i googled the "light arrangements"of copters and planes, i could not find one that met this description, so i am sending this in as unidentified.
before, during and after this event i had a terrible headache, much worse than any i might usually have. 
so, was this a helicopter, or something else ?
content.summary: Object circled neighborhood many times last night

content.detailedDescription: I was about 10 or 11 at the time.  i do not remember the exact date, but i know it was in the summer because at night, we used to sleep outside on our deck on mattresses in the summer time.  my mom and step-dad were downstairs in their bedroom; i was outside by myself looking at the stars waiting for them to come outside too.  i do not remember how it got there, but the next thing i do remember is seeing this medium-large sized thing floating in the air.  our house is 3 stories and our main floor is the second story, which is where our deck is.  my mom's room was downstairs below the main floor.  the ufo was not even close to a mile or even a half mile wide.  it was about as large as a small plane.  it was shaped like a planet with rings, but it was like all one shape, the top, middle and bottom flowed together smoothly but it was not round or oval.  it was covered all over in multi-colored lights.  i don't think there was a spot on it that could fit another light.  the colored lights were not in any particular pattern, it looked like a billion christmas lights but all the colors were shades that were not normal everyday colors...Not any colors i have seen lights or lightbulbs be.  it was hovering between this tree, that was about 20 feet from the deck, and the deck.  it was right about level with the top of the tree and about 15-20 feet above the deck and me.  there was no sound, it was very silent and quiet.  i just remember being in shock and standing there staring at it.  i don't even know how long i was out there because i did not look at a clock before or after it happened.  the next thing i remember is running in the house scared out of my mind, screaming for my mom and step-dad to come upstaris and screaming about a ufo and freaking out.  i was running all over the house locking the doors and windows...I was terrified!  my mom of course told me that i was making up things and to go back outside.  i started crying and begged her not to make me go out there again alone...But she made me anyways.  so i went back out there...Still terrified not knowing if it was still out there or not.  when i got outside, i looked up at the stars and over at the mountain that was to the left of me.  i saw, what i assume was the ufo i had just witnessed, hovering above the top of the mountain, then i saw a light coming from the bottom of it, shining down at the ground.  it then slowly lowered to the ground...Then all the lights disappeared and i never saw it again.
content.summary: Bright multi-colored lights covered every inch of it.  hovered between treetop and deck.

content.detailedDescription: Last nite at 6pm we were travelling west on the 91fwy. my wife said "what the hell are those" and i looked and saw a small plane and two bright lights. at first i thought they were passenger jets lining up for lax. but they dropped sharply down so i pulled over at the st college exit to watch these ufos  looked like fireballs with firetrails. one extinguished itself but the other one kept on. there was a helicopter circling (could have been a small plane) these ufos. the one that disappeared, reappeared. they then moved sideways, stopped, hovered and then moved sideways again. then after about 90 seconds they disappeared. the small plane/helicopter then flew overhead towards costa mesa/newport beach direction. it was surreal
content.summary: 2 fireball type obects over fullerton-placentia-yorba linda

content.detailedDescription: My mother, dad,sister, and girl friend (now wife of 55 years) were in a line up of about 15 cars at a drive in movie in merced, near castle a.F base. i saw a group of about 5 or 6 large,shimering gold colored spheres, about a mile high. they were moving about at incredible speeds, making stops and reversing or changing course in an instant. nearly all of the many occupants in the cars in line got out to witness this. this went on for about 10 minutes, then they formed into one large sphere and continued moving about. they seemed to resist all rules of gravity and inertia, and centered their activity pretty much around the a.F. base perimeter. about 5 or so minutes later, the large sphere started moving upward and eastward at a rapid speed, and then moved so fast that it became a pin point in about 3 seconds. i was 19 at the time. about 25 or 30 years later, i saw a video on tv of the exact same phenomenon over mexico city, (i think that was the site). and a few years later, i saw another tv video of the same thing, over brazil. within that same year, my dad, his partner and i were headed east, just past castle a.F. base, to go fishing at night. something very large arose behind us, apparently out of the a.F. base, hovered over us, killed our motor, then sped off at nearly the speed of light. our car's motor re-stated on its own. about 30 years after the merced incidents, i was the ceo of the hospital in big bear,san bernadino county. i hired a fundraiser who, as it turns out, was a retired a.F.Lt., and had been on project blue book. he had covered castle a.F.Base many times, he said. when i shared the above experiences, he ordered a few drinks, then started crying. he had investigated the globes, and a secret visit president eisnhower had made to one of the hangers about the same time. he said that the president was there to view wreckage remains of a ufo, and alien bodies, and he started crying. he would not discuss the matter any further, and went back to his apartment.
content.summary: This happened in 1952, at a drive-in near castle a. f. base, merced, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was heading west on ellsworth ave. in my car and was stopped at the stoplight at university avenue.  the brightness of a starlike object caught my attention about 45��� up in the western sky, which was free of clouds.  i observed the object the whole time through the windshield of my car, which happened to be clean for a change.  at the time the object was bright and starlike and then would disappear for a brief time, only to reappear.  the effect would be the same as if one looked at a aluminum pie plate that was tumbling in the wind.  the traffic light turned green and and i had to proceed through traffic and attempted to find another viewing spot, but was unable to do so.  i felt no physiologic or psychological effects at the time of the viewing incident.  the object did not appear to be moving, but only hovering.  there were no other observers in the area that i could tell.
content.summary: Star like ufo in western day time sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north bound on the 57 fwy heading towards yorba linda when i saw 2 meteorite like objects falling in the nw sky. i also saw what it looked like to be a plane flying around in the same general area. during the event the glowing tails coming from the 2 objects seemed to turned off and then resumed again after a short period of time.
content.summary: 2 meteorite objects falling from sky

content.detailedDescription: i. was attending a  stan romaneck lecture at the auraria campus on january 26, 2008 with a large group of people in the auditorium.  at about 4 p.M., the lecturer declared a break and the audience went outside to get a breath of fresh air and stretch their legs.  when i went outside i noted many of the attendees were looking skyward in a north easterly direction.  i looked in this direction and  saw three very small pinpoints of light.  they seemed to be standing still in the sky.  the portion of the sky that they appeared in was bright blue, and there were clouds on either side of the pinpoints of light but not close enough to obscure them.  eventually two of the pinpoints disappeared and only one remained.  a few seagulls were noted at high altitude, flying to and fro in the area but were different looking from the pinpoints of light.  the seagulls did not appear to be disturbed by the presence of the ufos that seemed further away than the birds. i felt excited by the wiew and i went  inside to get my wife, who was standing in line for the ladies room and brought her out to see.  unfortunately, she was not able to visualize the pinpoints of light.There were at least 20 to 30 other observers in the area with me at the time and some of them were taking pictures.  the temperature was about 40���, and there was only a gentle breeze blowing and viewing conditions were excellent.  when we returned to the lecture hall ,the lecturer asked how many people had seen the unidentified flying objects at the break.  at least 80% of the audience raised their hands
content.summary: A group seeing some ufo's  in the day time sky in a public place

content.detailedDescription: I was going down my inside staircase at 7:45pm on jan 7th 2008.  i noticed a big bright light on the other side of the highway(1/2mile from my house) through the window on the landing.  i looked at it for a few minutes thinking it a low flying plane with landing lights.  it didn't move.  i went to the outside staircase on the top landing to get a better look.  it was just a huge very bright light not moving.  as i watched, it began to move from the north to the south in a straight line.  this was coming closer to my house.  it seemed to be following the fence line between my neighbors and i.   i was amazed at how big it was which would be about the size of a big house.  now i could see it had lots of lights, some colored some strobe type, some blinking, some seemingly moving around.  i was amazed because it had no sound until it got closer and then i could hear what sounded like a displacement of air.  no motor or engine sound.  i called my neighbor and asked him to go outside to see the ufo.  big mistake.  he ran out his front or north facing door first then came back to the phone.  i repeatedly tried to direct him where it was and he couldn't see anything because i think he kept looking in the wrong direction.  this thing would have been very difficult to miss.  it got to a place that seemed to be on the other side of my barn but still going very slow and it turned a very quick 45 degree turn and started picking up speed.  it then sort of just whooshed off very fast going due east.  my neighbor had in the meantime gotten his binaculars and i said i could no longer see it except a faint light in the east.  he said definitely it was a heliocopter.  any plane or copter makes a noise.  one can usually hear a copter before you see it around here.  i work with horses outside and know this for fact as they disrupt the horses with the noise.  this was not a plane or copter or anything else i have ever seen in the air or anywhere.  i was fascinated more than afraid.  i couldn't take my eyes off of it to run get a camera.  i then called my sister in montana and my mother in houston to tell them about it.  i later heard the reports in stephenville, tx and felt better about talking about it.  but still most people don't believe me and the ones that do all wish they'd seen it too.  i have sent lots of these reports in to different addresses but haven't heard from anyone. it was not a mile long but definitely huge.  i have a barn that is about the same size of it.  it seemed to be quite low.  the wildest thing was no motor noise and the way it went very slow and could turn so sharp and could then whoosh off so fast.  i did notice a lot of dogs in the area were barking.  it had to go across our little fm road but it seemed to wait on the north side of the highway before crossing over.  and it did seem to follow my fence line.The whole scene took maybe 10 minutes.  it was an amazing thing and probably once in a lifetime thing.  the part that is most questionable is am i the only one in the area to see it?  so many people in the stephenville area saw something but this area is not near so populated.  but still.  i would appreciate any feedback.  thank you.  judy siracusa
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Big bright light that changed into a very big silent object with lots of lights

content.detailedDescription: Property behind house (wooded area) was recently sold to unknown owner. heard from a neighbor that it was supposed to be a parking lot for buses and other equipment. its evidently unfinished but end of it looks like a ufo landing area. noticed when i come home from work to feed dogs at night unkwown lights under tree debris at creek behind house. i will not approach not knowing what to expect. does not look like anyting i've ever seen (like an animal habitat). please respond to let me know if you've had any similar cases.
content.summary: Lights at night unknown under tree debris behind backyard

content.detailedDescription: I headed out of my house at around 2:15 to skate at a local school.  as i rounded the corner from my house, i noticed about a quarter to a third of the se sky light up with a greenish glow.  there was a central point(the best way to describe it is an orb/ball shaped) where the light was more intense than the surrounding area.  at first i just thought it was lightning because it had been raining on and off all night.  however, the light lingered for about seven or eight seconds.  there was no clap/rumble of thunder as the light appeared or after it was gone. i've never seen anything produce this quality/color in the night sky.  after the light disappeared, the streetlights along my street and a couple adjacent streets went out for about ten seconds.  i wanted to report this light phenomena to see if anyone in the bay area had a similar experience or an explanation for what i saw.
content.summary: Glow in clouds with no associated sound followed by street lights going out

content.detailedDescription: On around january 15th 2008,at aprox. 8:00 pm, i was jumping on our trampoline with my son. three flying lights got my attention. they were shaped like triangles and were flyng in unison in a three point formation. it seemed to be flying slow in a south west direction. i was at first confused at the altitude. it seemed to be flying a little higher than the landing small planes at santa monica airport. although i thought the altitude might be high   because it seemed to be moving slow and very steady.Once i saw it, i stopped jumping and observed it for maybe 45 seconds.I new it looked unusual. my initial explanation was that it was a group of shooting stars.The next day i forgot about the sighting until january 26th 2008 when i was watching a larry king program on a january 8th texas sighting. it reminded me of what i saw. i went to my computer and did a search for recent ufo sightings. i was truly astonished when i started reading the descriptions of different sightings in the last 100 years. many of them were described exactly the same as what i saw. could they have been three jets or shooting stars. until tonight i thought that to be a reasonable explanation.
content.summary: I was in our back yard at night. i notices three triangles in a triangle formation flying s/w

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving down yorba linda boulevard with two others in the car and we saw two orange ovals in the sky.  it was very dark and had been raining so the clouds were low.  there were two airplanes overhead, one of which began to circle the area as the objects were hovering around.

the objects hovered around for about 3 minutes.  they would remain stationary for short periods, then rotate and move.  you could tell they were rotating as they moved because a short trail was left behind them.  note that the trail and glow was some sort of orange energy, very similar to a mercury lamp on the street.  

they would also turn on and off intermitently.  we were able to study them as we drove down the street.  there were a lot of cars so i wouldn't be surprised if there are a few more reports on this one.  note that i also posted on the ufocenter.Org website.

lastly, as one of them moved down pretty low, it turned off and reappeared over the other one.  wild stuff.
content.summary: Two orange ovals with trails hovering over yorba linda boulevard in placentia, oc, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a movie in the living room with my mother when she noticed a very bright light in the western sky through the window and we both got up and went outside to investigate.  she thought at first that it was several helicopters and then quickly decided that wasn't the case.  what i saw was a very bright oval or saucer-shaped thing, yellow-white, moving slowly in a north or northwest direction while a small private or commuter plane apparently circled above the object as though it were watching it from above.  about 5 degrees north of the bright oval i saw what appeared as a meteor-like trail against the black cloudy sky in the shape of a tight oval or circle.  this was when i knew something extraordinary was going on.  and then i saw the bright saucer-shaped oval emit a similar "ring of fire" like light about its outer edges.  the whole thing was incredible.  as i watch, the bright oval emitted this weird ring of fire twice and then i ran inside to get my digital slr because i knew i could photograph it.  however, by the time i returned and had the lens cap off and the camera up to my eye the object passed behind trees in the distance and was lost from view.  i should state the the object appeared to be growing lower in the sky the further north it moved.  i detected no noise of any kind from the object, and the only noise from the sky was that of the engines of the plane which circled above.  the plane continued to circle for a few minutes after we lost sight of the object and then it turned and flew off into the southeast.
content.summary: A slow moving yellow-white oval  emitting a ring of fire or sparks

content.detailedDescription: It was wednesday 23 7:00 am and with a light rain, a beautiful double raibow formed  north to west in the sky, i run inside and i took some pictures with my 7 megapixel point and shoot finepix s5700 digital camera. that night went i arrived home from work and was looking at the pictures in the computer, i notice 2 dots, the closer one looks strange when i zoomed in with the mouse (egg shaped with a long shadow bellow), the blurry corner on the botton right of the picture is a rain drop on the protective filter.
content.summary: Ufo or ifo ?, it shows up on my rainbows pictures
